page.title: 12HOMELIFE
page.content: Home is a place where you find love and care. Today children spend a lot of time{watching television}or playing with the{computers.} Almost every home owns at least one television. Many children spend time alone because parents are working or are away from home. Most children do chores at home especially if both parents are at work. 65% of children aged 13 who were interviewed had their own door key. At home, children frequently argue with brothers, sisters and parents. One problem is when children in the family take each others possessions without asking permission. Viewers of the television are sometimes bored by what they watch. According to our survey life in the home in 1985 is dominated by television.
